alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 22 at 11:51AM EST until December 24 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 2 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Maine. Portions of central and southern New Hampshire. Peak winds are expected closer to the coast. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 2 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive. Also secure outdoor holiday decorations.
